Package hospital.staff

Class Staff

java.lang.Object
hospital.staff.Staff
All Implemented Interfaces:
UndoRedoExecutor, java.io.Serializable
public class Staff
extends java.lang.Object
implements UndoRedoExecutor, java.io.Serializable
Staff class contains a HashSet of Professionals. The HashSet implements the Set interface. Members can be added and removed from the staff.
See Also:
Serialized Form

  • Method Details

    • addMember

      public void addMember​(Professional newMember)
      Adds a new member to the staff.
      Parameters:
      newMember - The professional to add as a new member.

    • removeMember

      public boolean removeMember​(Professional member)
      Removes a professional from the staff, also removing them from each of their appointments, adding another needed professional if any are free
      Parameters:
      member - member to remove
      Returns:
      false/true whether the member was removed

    • searchAvailability

      public java.util.List<Appointment> searchAvailability​(java.util.List<Professional> professionals, java.time.LocalDateTime from, java.time.LocalDateTime to)
      Finds all common available slots in a list of provided professionals. Time taken to search the diaries is recorded and displayed to the user.
      Parameters:
      professionals - The list of professionals who have to share the new appointment.
      from - The starting time of the interval to search in.
      to - The ending time of the interval to search in.
      Returns:
      A set of available time-slots as empty appointments, which are free for all of the involved professionals.

    • getProfessionalsByRole

      public java.util.List<Professional> getProfessionalsByRole​(Role role)
      List of professionals is filtered by role.
      Parameters:
      role - role to filter by
      Returns:
      list of professionals only with the given role

    • bookAppointment

      public Appointment bookAppointment​(java.util.List<Professional> professionals, java.time.LocalDateTime startTime, java.time.LocalDateTime endTime, java.lang.String room, TreatmentType treatmentType)
      Books an appointment in one or more electronic diaries of the involved professionals. It also checks if the given time-slot is free and available for all of the involved professionals.
      Parameters:
      professionals - A list of the ids of the professionals who are involved in the new appointment.
      startTime - The time when the new appointment starts.
      endTime - The time when the new appointment ends.
      room - The name/number of the room where the appointment will take place.
      treatmentType - The type of treatment the new appointment has.
      Returns:
      The newly created appointment or null if the booking was unsuccessful.

    • editAppointment

      public Appointment editAppointment​(long appointmentId, java.util.List<Professional> newProfessionals, java.time.LocalDateTime startTime, java.time.LocalDateTime endTime, java.lang.String room)
      Edit one of the appointment of one of the staff member. If more than one professionals are involved in the treatment, it checks if the modifications do not conflict with any of the professionals' electronic diary.
      Parameters:
      appointmentId - The ID of the appointment to modify.
      newProfessionals - A list of the professionals who are involved in the appointment, including the owner themself.
      startTime - The time when the appointment starts.
      endTime - The time when the appointment ends.
      room - The name/number of the room where the appointment will take place.
      Returns:
      The modified appointment. It is possible, that the modification was unsuccessful, and the returned appointment is the unmodified one. The return can be null, if the appointment could not have been found.

    • deleteAppointment

      public Appointment deleteAppointment​(long appointmentId)
      Deletes an appointment from one of professional's electronic diary. It also deletes it from all the involved professionals' diaries.
      Parameters:
      appointmentId - The ID of the appointment to delete.
      Returns:
      The deleted appointment or null, if the deletion was unsuccessful.

    • searchAppointment

      public Appointment searchAppointment​(long appointmentId)
      Search for an appointment in one of the professional's electronic diary.
      Parameters:
      appointmentId - The ID of the appointment to search for.
      Returns:
      The found appointment or null if it could not have been found.

    • getStaff

      public java.util.Set<Professional> getStaff()
      Returns the set of all the professionals
      Returns:
      set of professionals

    • setStaff

      public void setStaff​(java.util.Set<Professional> staff)
      Sets the staff of professionals
      Parameters:
      staff - professional set to be set

    • searchById

      public Professional searchById​(java.lang.String id)
      Searches professional by ID and returns if found
      Parameters:
      id - id to be filtered by
      Returns:
      the found professional or null if not found

    • searchByUsername

      public Professional searchByUsername​(java.lang.String username)
      Searches professional by their username and returns if found
      Parameters:
      username - username to be filtered by
      Returns:
      if found professional, otherwise null
